info.name: FSM System API - Complete Collection
info.description: Complete Field Service Management API Collection - Updated Nov 26, 2025 with ALL endpoints including Reviews, Dispatch Center, Time Management, and enhanced features

request.description:
Send OTP for phone verification. Types: REGISTRATION, LOGIN, PASSWORD_RESET, VERIFICATION

TESTED & WORKING (Dec 2, 2025)

Phone Format (Bangladesh):
- +8801718981009 (recommended - with country code)
- 8801718981009 (works - auto-formatted)
- 01718981009 (works - auto-converted to 8801718981009)

Response includes:
- OTP code (for testing/development)
- Expiry time (5 minutes)
- SMS status (sent/failed)

Note: OTP is stored in database and valid for 5 minutes. SMS delivery depends on BulkGate credits.

Verify OTP code sent to phone number

TESTED & WORKING (Dec 2, 2025)

Requirements:
- Use the SAME phone format as Send OTP
- 6-digit code must match exactly
- Must be verified within 5 minutes
- Type must match the Send OTP request

Success Response:
- verified: true
- tempToken: Temporary token for registration (valid 10 minutes)
- tempTokenExpiry: Token expiration time

Use the tempToken to complete registration with /api/auth/set-password endpoint.
Register new user. Roles: CUSTOMER, TECH_FREELANCER, TECH_INTERNAL, DISPATCHER, CALL_CENTER, ADMIN
Logout current user and invalidate token
Change user password (requires old password)
Get current user's profile information with statistics (totalBookings, totalSpent, businessHours for CUSTOMER role)
Update current user's profile
Call center can update any customer's profile
Call center searches for existing customer by phone number before creating SR

query.description: Filter by technician ID (for my tasks)

request.description:
Get all work orders with filtering options.

Query Parameters:
• status: Filter by status (UNASSIGNED, ASSIGNED, ACCEPTED, IN_PROGRESS, COMPLETED, CANCELLED)
• technicianId: Filter by technician ID (for freelancer to see their own tasks)
• customerId: Filter by customer ID
• priority: Filter by priority (LOW, MEDIUM, HIGH, URGENT)
• page: Page number (default: 1)
• limit: Results per page (default: 10)

For Freelancer Technician Dashboard:
1. Active Tasks (Ready to Start + In Progress):
   GET /api/wos?technicianId={id}&status=ASSIGNED (Ready to Start)
   GET /api/wos?technicianId={id}&status=ACCEPTED (Active Now)
   GET /api/wos?technicianId={id}&status=IN_PROGRESS (In Progress)

2. Completed Tasks This Month:
   GET /api/wos?technicianId={id}&status=COMPLETED

3. Task Counts:
   • Ready to Start: status=ASSIGNED
   • Active Now: status=ACCEPTED or IN_PROGRESS
   • This Month: status=COMPLETED (filter by date range)

Response includes full work order details with customer, technician, category info, payment and commission data, service request reference, and GPS coordinates for location.

formdata.value: AC fixed, cleaned filters, refilled gas

request.description: Complete work order with photos, notes, and materials used
Cancel work order (Admin/Dispatcher only)
Get remaining time before work order expires (status auto-changes after deadline)
View all active work order deadlines with time remaining
Manually trigger cleanup of expired work orders (auto-runs every 5 minutes)

Reassign work order to a different technician (Admin/Dispatcher only).

Use Cases:
• Original technician unavailable
• Better skilled technician needed
• Load balancing between technicians
• Technician declined the job

Request Body:
• technicianId (required): New technician ID (must be active/unblocked)
• reason (optional): Reason for reassignment

IMPORTANT: Ensure the technician ID is active and not blocked. Use Get All Technicians endpoint to find available technicians.

Note: This changes the assigned technician. For rescheduling dates/times, you need to:
1. Cancel the current WO
2. Create a new WO from the SR with updated schedule

Or use the SR Rebook endpoint before WO creation.

Reschedule work order to a different date and time (Admin/Dispatcher only).

Use Cases:
• Customer requests different date/time
• Technician availability changed
• Weather or emergency delays
• Optimizing technician schedule

Request Body:
• scheduledDate (required): Date in YYYY-MM-DD format
• scheduledTime (required): Time in HH:MM format (24-hour)
• estimatedDuration (optional): Duration in hours (will be converted to minutes)
• notes (optional): Reason for rescheduling

Restrictions:
• Cannot reschedule COMPLETED or CANCELLED work orders
• New date/time must be in the future
• Technician and customer will be notified

formdata.description: Payment screenshot (M-Pesa) or bank deposit slip (Cash)

request.description:
Technician uploads payment proof after completing job:
- Mobile Money: Screenshot of M-Pesa/mobile money transaction
- Cash: Bank deposit slip or receipt showing cash deposited to company account
Get all payments with optional status filter (Admin/Dispatcher only)
Get payment statistics overview including totals by status and method
Get payment details by ID (accessible by Admin, Dispatcher, and Technicians)
Approve payment proof and trigger commission calculation (Admin/Dispatcher only)
Reject payment proof with reason, work order returns to COMPLETED status (Admin/Dispatcher only)

Get technician/freelancer wallet balance and recent transactions.

Response includes:
• balance: Current available balance (always >= 0)
• actualBalance: Real balance (may be negative if adjustments needed)
• recentTransactions: Last 10 wallet transactions
• warning: Alert if balance requires adjustment

Wallet is automatically created when technician completes their first paid work order.

Get technician commission history for completed work orders.

Query Parameters:
• status: Filter by EARNED, PAID, or PENDING
• startDate: Filter from date (YYYY-MM-DD)
• endDate: Filter to date (YYYY-MM-DD)

Response includes:
• amount: Commission amount per work order
• status: EARNED (available), PAID (withdrawn), PENDING (processing)
• workOrder: Associated work order details
• createdAt: When commission was earned

Get comprehensive dashboard summary for technician/freelancer.

Response includes:
• walletBalance: Current available balance
• totalEarned: Total earned commissions (available for payout)
• totalPaid: Total already paid out commissions
• pendingPayout: Amount pending withdrawal
• totalAllTimeEarnings: Lifetime total earnings

This endpoint provides complete financial overview including:
- Current wallet balance
- Total jobs completed with commissions
- Total earnings across all time
- Available funds for payout request
